Ok guys, if you can't find it, AFTER you installed Halo 2, go to the install directory (e.x: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft games\Halo 2")

Once you are there, there is a file called halo2.exe.cfg, open that up with notepad, it'll say: 
the code you copy is here
